items.summary: It might be just my type. items.title: Punktâ€™s German-made MC03 smartphone comes to the US this spring
items.summary: The MC03 aims to improve on the MC02â€™s shortcomings. Punkt, the Switzerland-based, privacy-focused phone maker, is trying the whole "smartphone" thing again. The MC03 improves on some of the disappointing features of its previous effort, the MC02, while maintaining its security focus. Likewise, itsâ€¦

items.title: The Trump phone just missed another release date
items.summary: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it's missed yet another of its promised release dates. When we started writing about Trumâ€¦

items.title: Watson to miss Australian Open because of injury
items.summary: Heather Watson will miss the Australian Open but says she is on course to return from injury by the end of February.

items.title: 'There's no cure' - the eye condition affecting Littler's opponent Searle
items.summary: Ryan Searle opens up on incurable eye condition ahead of semi-final World Darts Championship tie against Luke Littler.

items.title: Rangers 'working 24/7' on signings, says boss Rohl
items.summary: Rangers are working around the clock to recruit players in the January transfer window, says head coach Danny Rohl.
